definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble/doing things at the last minute/to make a hasty last-minute effort (often refers to cramming for exams)
pinyin: ping2 shi2 bu4 shao1 xiang1 , lin2 shi2 bao4 fo2 jiao3
containing_words.word: 平时不烧香，临时抱佛脚

sentences.english: The earth was as completely cloud-shrouded as normally is the planet Venus.
sentences.chinese: 整个地球就像金星平时那样完全被云雾掩盖着。

sentences.english: But, consider how we often describe these types of events.
sentences.chinese: 我们平时是如何描述这些类型的事情的呢。

sentences.english: To learn to type, seldom at ordinary times used phoneticize also was collected rise.
sentences.chinese: 为了学打字，平时不常用的拼音也捡了起来。

sentences.english: I am a decent and open-minded girl, so I am enthusiastic about studying and work and the life itself.
sentences.chinese: 在平时生活中，我是个开朗热情大方的孩子。

sentences.english: This means no more re-typing the password as you would normally do on the command line.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着不需要像平时一样在命令行上重复输入密码。

sentences.english: I think I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平时卖东西时用的自行车去参加铁人三项赛。

sentences.english: Again has a look us, usually meets slightly is difficult, we all complain incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 再看看我们，平时遇到一点小困难，我们都叫苦连天。

sentences.english: The donkey helped them pull the field plow during sowing season and carry them to the market.
sentences.chinese: 这头驴平时帮他们种地拉磨，赶集时还要作脚力。

sentences.english: Hanhan's neighbor, usually didn't socialize much and scholar.
sentences.chinese: 憨憨与秀才是邻居，平时来往不多。

sentences.english: When people sleep on their front, their lower jaw is positioned further forward than normal.
sentences.chinese: 因为当人们俯卧的时候，下颚会比平时更加突出。

sentences.english: We went to lunch but not where we'd normally go.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去吃饭，却没有去平时常去的地方。

sentences.english: I sign the memorials with a point usually.
sentences.chinese: “朕平时批阅奏章，就是点个点”。

sentences.english: It cannot be at war with a peacetime mind-set.
sentences.chinese: 不能以和平时期的心态参战。

sentences.english: Dining room is at ordinary times family dines jointly or the life space of repast of fete relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 餐室是平时家人共同进餐或宴请亲友就餐的生活空间。

sentences.english: Peace with sword in hand, 'Tis safest making.
sentences.chinese: 和平时期手执剑，这样做来最保险。

sentences.english: Kick breaststroke as you normally would, but watch the board.
sentences.chinese: 像平时一样蹬蛙泳腿，要看着鳍线板。

definition: habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
